messages.subject: : Good news kind of long, but I wanted to share
messages.msgSnippet: I really hope this works out well for you. Putting on  a lot of weight when  physical problems work against  using exercise  is really  agonizing. I have
messages.messageBody:
I really hope this works out well for you.
Putting on a lot of weight when physical problems work against using exercise is really agonizing. I have developed severe knee problems along with the foot problems and the weight is piling on and it is so frustrating .

Hope your wishes for another child come true for you.Thank you for sharing this with us so we could send you hugs and encouragement.

grace

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
